price: He knows all that is ahead of them and all that is behind them[38], but they do not encompass it[39] with their knowledge.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِهِۦ عِلۡمٗا
footnotes:
[38] i.e., what awaits them in the Hereafter and what they did in the world.
 [39] i.e., His knowledge.
